internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this electrode array within the file it is stored in.

electrodeIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for each electrode (contact point) of this electrode array. Number of identifiers should match the 'numberOfElectrodes'.

insulatorMaterial._instruction: Add the insulator material of this electrode array.

conductorMaterial._instruction: Add the conductor material of this electrode array.

intrinsicResistance._instruction: Enter the intrinsic resistances of this electrode array.

numberOfElectrodes._instruction: Enter the number of electrodes of this array.
